Queen Sirikit National Convention Centre MRT station (, , code BL23) or QSNCC station is a Bangkok MRT station on the Blue Line, in Bangkok, Thailand. Located under Ratchadaphisek Road, near Queen Sirikit National Convention Centre, Benjakitti Park, PAT Stadium and Khlong Toei Market.
Station details
Use symbol as Queen Sirikit National Convention Centre's buildings and colour is yellow. It is an underground station, width , length , depth , and uses an island platform.
There is a MetroMall in the station.
